data.title: Ran (Blu-Ray)
data.meta_description: Blood-spattered and brutal version of 'King Lear', with three sons instead of three daughters. Akira Kurosawa took the story and remade it into this highly regarded, blood splattered 'Period of the Warring States' epic. After years of ruthless slaughter Hidetero splits his kingdom amongst his sons seeking a peaceful retirement, but his life descends into chaos as he is unable to escape the corruption within his own family and the torment within his soul. Special Features	Interactive Menus	Scene Access	Interviews: Sh√¥ji Ueda (Cinematographer), Mieko Harada (Actor), Michael Brooke (Film Expert)	Other Documentary: 'AK', ''Ran' - The Restoration', 'Akira Kurosawa: The Epic and the Intimate', 'Akira Kurosawa By Catherine Cadou', 'Art of the Samurai', 'The Samurai'
data.text:
Blood-spattered and brutal version of 'King Lear', with three sons instead of three daughters. Akira Kurosawa took the story and remade it into this highly regarded, blood splattered 'Period of the Warring States' epic. After years of ruthless slaughter Hidetero splits his kingdom amongst his sons seeking a peaceful retirement, but his life descends into chaos as he is unable to escape the corruption within his own family and the torment within his soul.

Special Features
